clip.quote: If you do what I tell you, I promise you that in a year you won't recognize yourself.
clip.why_clipworthy: This statement is motivational and promises transformative results, resonating with listeners seeking change.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to transform your life in just one year? Here's how!

  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Want to transform your life in just one year? Here's how!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Dr. Erin Helle, a transformation expert. Her advice promises a life you won't recognize in just 12 months.",
